mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT SUM(AGREE_CUSTOMER_COUNT) AS AGREE_CUSTOMER_COUNT, SUM(AGREE_FLLOW_CUSTOMER_COUNT) AS AGREE_FLLOW_CUSTOMER_COUNT, SUM(AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT) AS AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT, SUM(AGREE_COUNT) AS AGREE_COUNT, DIM_CUSTOMER_PROP FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_COMPANY_AGREE_CUSTOMER_PROP WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY DIM_CUSTOMER_PROP)S

SELECT AGREE_CUSTOMER_COUNT, AGREE_FLLOW_CUSTOMER_COUNT, AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT, CONCAT(convert(IFNULL(AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT/AGREE_FLLOW_CUSTOMER_COUNT*100,0),decimal(18,2)),'%') AS FLLOW_FREQUENCY, AGREE_COUNT, CONCAT(convert(IFNULL(AGREE_COUNT/AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT*100,0),decimal(18,2)),'%') AS AGREE_PER, DIM_CUSTOMER_PROP FROM ( SELECT SUM(AGREE_CUSTOMER_COUNT) AS AGREE_CUSTOMER_COUNT, SUM(AGREE_FLLOW_CUSTOMER_COUNT) AS AGREE_FLLOW_CUSTOMER_COUNT, SUM(AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT) AS AGREE_FLLOW_COUNT, SUM(AGREE_COUNT) AS AGREE_COUNT, DIM_CUSTOMER_PROP FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_COMPANY_AGREE_CUSTOMER_PROP WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY DIM_CUSTOMER_PROP)S
